0.question:
Consider a biased spinner with three cyan sections and one jade section. The spinner will be spun 10 times and the sequence of cyans (C) and jades (J) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) JCJJ
(b) JCC
(c) JCJC.

1.question:
Consider a spinner with three yellow sections and two blue sections. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of yellows (Y) and blues (B) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) UGUG
(b) UUUUGUGG
(c) GUGUU.

2.question:
Consider a bag containing 10 marbles. There are 6 blue marbles (B) and 4 navy marbles (N) in the bag. The bag will be shaken 15 times, and the sequence of blues (B) and navys (N) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $30 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive shakes of the bag.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) NBBB
(b) NNN
(c) BNNBBB.

3.question:
Consider a spinner with five blue sections and three yellow sections. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and yellows (Y) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) TJJT
(b) TTJ
(c) TTTJT.

4.question:
Consider a bag containing 8 marbles - 5 blue marbles (B) and 3 white marbles (W). The bag will be shaken vigorously and a marble will be randomly drawn from it 15 times. The sequence of blues (B) and whites (W) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $30 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) BFBFF
(b) FBF
(c) BFBBBB.
